CustomField.description: Indication that this customer is going to receive manual invoices. This means that all related Orders that are related to this Account record with a SOLD-TO relationship, will be put in the 'manual' invoicing batch. The only way to trigger invoicing for these orders, is by using this batch or manually creating the invoices.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Will set all related SOLD-TO Orders to the Manual Invoicing batch, allowing them to be processed by the manual invoicing only.
CustomField.label: Manual Invoicing
